   11389              : namespace Catch {
   11390              : 
   11391              :     namespace {
   11392              :         // Yes, this has to be outside the class and namespaced by naming.
   11393              :         // Making older compiler happy is hard.
   11394              :         static constexpr StringRef tapFailedString = "not ok"_sr;
   11395              :         static constexpr StringRef tapPassedString = "ok"_sr;
   11396              :         static constexpr Colour::Code tapDimColour = Colour::FileName;
   11397              : 
   11398              :         class TapAssertionPrinter {
   11399              :         public:
   11400              :             TapAssertionPrinter& operator= (TapAssertionPrinter const&) = delete;
   11401              :             TapAssertionPrinter(TapAssertionPrinter const&) = delete;
   11402            0 :             TapAssertionPrinter(std::ostream& _stream, AssertionStats const& _stats, std::size_t _counter, ColourImpl* colour_)
   11403            0 :                 : stream(_stream)
   11404            0 :                 , result(_stats.assertionResult)
   11405            0 :                 , messages(_stats.infoMessages)
   11406            0 :                 , itMessage(_stats.infoMessages.begin())
   11407            0 :                 , printInfoMessages(true)
   11408            0 :                 , counter(_counter)
   11409            0 :                 , colourImpl( colour_ ) {}
   11410              : 
   11411            0 :             void print() {
   11412            0 :                 itMessage = messages.begin();
   11413              : 
   11414            0 :                 switch (result.getResultType()) {
   11415            0 :                 case ResultWas::Ok:
   11416            0 :                     printResultType(tapPassedString);
   11417            0 :                     printOriginalExpression();
   11418            0 :                     printReconstructedExpression();
   11419            0 :                     if (!result.hasExpression())
   11420            0 :                         printRemainingMessages(Colour::None);
   11421              :                     else
   11422            0 :                         printRemainingMessages();
   11423            0 :                     break;
   11424            0 :                 case ResultWas::ExpressionFailed:
   11425            0 :                     if (result.isOk()) {
   11426            0 :                         printResultType(tapPassedString);
   11427              :                     } else {
   11428            0 :                         printResultType(tapFailedString);
   11429              :                     }
   11430            0 :                     printOriginalExpression();
   11431            0 :                     printReconstructedExpression();
   11432            0 :                     if (result.isOk()) {
   11433            0 :                         printIssue(" # TODO");
   11434              :                     }
   11435            0 :                     printRemainingMessages();
   11436            0 :                     break;
   11437            0 :                 case ResultWas::ThrewException:
   11438            0 :                     printResultType(tapFailedString);
   11439            0 :                     printIssue("unexpected exception with message:"_sr);
   11440            0 :                     printMessage();
   11441            0 :                     printExpressionWas();
   11442            0 :                     printRemainingMessages();
   11443            0 :                     break;
   11444            0 :                 case ResultWas::FatalErrorCondition:
   11445            0 :                     printResultType(tapFailedString);
   11446            0 :                     printIssue("fatal error condition with message:"_sr);
   11447            0 :                     printMessage();
   11448            0 :                     printExpressionWas();
   11449            0 :                     printRemainingMessages();
   11450            0 :                     break;
   11451            0 :                 case ResultWas::DidntThrowException:
   11452            0 :                     printResultType(tapFailedString);
   11453            0 :                     printIssue("expected exception, got none"_sr);
   11454            0 :                     printExpressionWas();
   11455            0 :                     printRemainingMessages();
   11456            0 :                     break;
   11457            0 :                 case ResultWas::Info:
   11458            0 :                     printResultType("info"_sr);
   11459            0 :                     printMessage();
   11460            0 :                     printRemainingMessages();
   11461            0 :                     break;
   11462            0 :                 case ResultWas::Warning:
   11463            0 :                     printResultType("warning"_sr);
   11464            0 :                     printMessage();
   11465            0 :                     printRemainingMessages();
   11466            0 :                     break;
   11467            0 :                 case ResultWas::ExplicitFailure:
   11468            0 :                     printResultType(tapFailedString);
   11469            0 :                     printIssue("explicitly"_sr);
   11470            0 :                     printRemainingMessages(Colour::None);
   11471            0 :                     break;
   11472            0 :                 case ResultWas::ExplicitSkip:
   11473            0 :                     printResultType(tapPassedString);
   11474            0 :                     printIssue(" # SKIP"_sr);
   11475            0 :                     printMessage();
   11476            0 :                     printRemainingMessages();
   11477            0 :                     break;
   11478              :                     // These cases are here to prevent compiler warnings
   11479            0 :                 case ResultWas::Unknown:
   11480              :                 case ResultWas::FailureBit:
   11481              :                 case ResultWas::Exception:
   11482            0 :                     printResultType("** internal error **"_sr);
   11483            0 :                     break;
   11484              :                 }
   11485            0 :             }
   11486              : 
   11487              :         private:
   11488            0 :             void printResultType(StringRef passOrFail) const {
   11489            0 :                 if (!passOrFail.empty()) {
   11490            0 :                     stream << passOrFail << ' ' << counter << " -";
   11491              :                 }
   11492            0 :             }
   11493              : 
   11494            0 :             void printIssue(StringRef issue) const {
   11495            0 :                 stream << ' ' << issue;
   11496            0 :             }
   11497              : 
   11498            0 :             void printExpressionWas() {
   11499            0 :                 if (result.hasExpression()) {
   11500            0 :                     stream << ';';
   11501            0 :                     stream << colourImpl->guardColour( tapDimColour )
   11502            0 :                            << " expression was:";
   11503            0 :                     printOriginalExpression();
   11504              :                 }
   11505            0 :             }
   11506              : 
   11507            0 :             void printOriginalExpression() const {
   11508            0 :                 if (result.hasExpression()) {
   11509            0 :                     stream << ' ' << result.getExpression();
   11510              :                 }
   11511            0 :             }
   11512              : 
   11513            0 :             void printReconstructedExpression() const {
   11514            0 :                 if (result.hasExpandedExpression()) {
   11515            0 :                     stream << colourImpl->guardColour( tapDimColour ) << " for: ";
   11516              : 
   11517            0 :                     std::string expr = result.getExpandedExpression();
   11518            0 :                     std::replace(expr.begin(), expr.end(), '\n', ' ');
   11519            0 :                     stream << expr;
   11520            0 :                 }
   11521            0 :             }
   11522              : 
   11523            0 :             void printMessage() {
   11524            0 :                 if (itMessage != messages.end()) {
   11525            0 :                     stream << " '" << itMessage->message << '\'';
   11526            0 :                     ++itMessage;
   11527              :                 }
   11528            0 :             }
   11529              : 
   11530            0 :             void printRemainingMessages(Colour::Code colour = tapDimColour) {
   11531            0 :                 if (itMessage == messages.end()) {
   11532            0 :                     return;
   11533              :                 }
   11534              : 
   11535              :                 // using messages.end() directly (or auto) yields compilation error:
   11536            0 :                 std::vector<MessageInfo>::const_iterator itEnd = messages.end();
   11537            0 :                 const std::size_t N = static_cast<std::size_t>(itEnd - itMessage);
   11538              : 
   11539            0 :                 stream << colourImpl->guardColour( colour ) << " with "
   11540            0 :                        << pluralise( N, "message"_sr ) << ':';
   11541              : 
   11542            0 :                 for (; itMessage != itEnd; ) {
   11543              :                     // If this assertion is a warning ignore any INFO messages
   11544            0 :                     if (printInfoMessages || itMessage->type != ResultWas::Info) {
   11545            0 :                         stream << " '" << itMessage->message << '\'';
   11546            0 :                         if (++itMessage != itEnd) {
   11547            0 :                             stream << colourImpl->guardColour(tapDimColour) << " and";
   11548              :                         }
   11549              :                     }
   11550              :                 }
   11551              :             }
   11552              : 
   11553              :         private:
   11554              :             std::ostream& stream;
   11555              :             AssertionResult const& result;
   11556              :             std::vector<MessageInfo> const& messages;
   11557              :             std::vector<MessageInfo>::const_iterator itMessage;
   11558              :             bool printInfoMessages;
   11559              :             std::size_t counter;
   11560              :             ColourImpl* colourImpl;
   11561              :         };
   11562              :

   11564              :

   11607              : namespace Catch {
   11608              : 
   11609              :     namespace {
   11610              :         // if string has a : in first line will set indent to follow it on
   11611              :         // subsequent lines
   11612            0 :         void printHeaderString(std::ostream& os, std::string const& _string, std::size_t indent = 0) {
   11613            0 :             std::size_t i = _string.find(": ");
   11614            0 :             if (i != std::string::npos)
   11615            0 :                 i += 2;
   11616              :             else
   11617            0 :                 i = 0;
   11618            0 :             os << TextFlow::Column(_string)
   11619            0 :                   .indent(indent + i)
   11620            0 :                   .initialIndent(indent) << '\n';
   11621            0 :         }
   11622              : 
   11623            0 :         std::string escape(StringRef str) {
   11624            0 :             std::string escaped = static_cast<std::string>(str);
   11625            0 :             replaceInPlace(escaped, "|", "||");
   11626            0 :             replaceInPlace(escaped, "'", "|'");
   11627            0 :             replaceInPlace(escaped, "\n", "|n");
   11628            0 :             replaceInPlace(escaped, "\r", "|r");
   11629            0 :             replaceInPlace(escaped, "[", "|[");
   11630            0 :             replaceInPlace(escaped, "]", "|]");
   11631            0 :             return escaped;
   11632            0 :         }
   11633              :     } // end anonymous namespace
   11634              : 
   11635              : 
   11636            0 :     TeamCityReporter::~TeamCityReporter() = default;
   11637              : 
   11638            0 :     void TeamCityReporter::testRunStarting( TestRunInfo const& runInfo ) {
   11639            0 :         m_stream << "##teamcity[testSuiteStarted name='" << escape( runInfo.name )
   11640            0 :                << "']\n";
   11641            0 :     }
   11642              : 
   11643            0 :     void TeamCityReporter::testRunEnded( TestRunStats const& runStats ) {
   11644            0 :         m_stream << "##teamcity[testSuiteFinished name='"
   11645            0 :                << escape( runStats.runInfo.name ) << "']\n";
   11646            0 :     }
   11647              : 
   11648            0 :     void TeamCityReporter::assertionEnded(AssertionStats const& assertionStats) {
   11649            0 :         AssertionResult const& result = assertionStats.assertionResult;
   11650            0 :         if ( !result.isOk() ||
   11651            0 :              result.getResultType() == ResultWas::ExplicitSkip ) {
   11652              : 
   11653            0 :             ReusableStringStream msg;
   11654            0 :             if (!m_headerPrintedForThisSection)
   11655            0 :                 printSectionHeader(msg.get());
   11656            0 :             m_headerPrintedForThisSection = true;
   11657              : 
   11658            0 :             msg << result.getSourceInfo() << '\n';
   11659              : 
   11660            0 :             switch (result.getResultType()) {
   11661            0 :             case ResultWas::ExpressionFailed:
   11662            0 :                 msg << "expression failed";
   11663            0 :                 break;
   11664            0 :             case ResultWas::ThrewException:
   11665            0 :                 msg << "unexpected exception";
   11666            0 :                 break;
   11667            0 :             case ResultWas::FatalErrorCondition:
   11668            0 :                 msg << "fatal error condition";
   11669            0 :                 break;
   11670            0 :             case ResultWas::DidntThrowException:
   11671            0 :                 msg << "no exception was thrown where one was expected";
   11672            0 :                 break;
   11673            0 :             case ResultWas::ExplicitFailure:
   11674            0 :                 msg << "explicit failure";
   11675            0 :                 break;
   11676            0 :             case ResultWas::ExplicitSkip:
   11677            0 :                 msg << "explicit skip";
   11678            0 :                 break;
   11679              : 
   11680              :                 // We shouldn't get here because of the isOk() test
   11681            0 :             case ResultWas::Ok:
   11682              :             case ResultWas::Info:
   11683              :             case ResultWas::Warning:
   11684            0 :                 CATCH_ERROR("Internal error in TeamCity reporter");
   11685              :                 // These cases are here to prevent compiler warnings
   11686            0 :             case ResultWas::Unknown:
   11687              :             case ResultWas::FailureBit:
   11688              :             case ResultWas::Exception:
   11689            0 :                 CATCH_ERROR("Not implemented");
   11690              :             }
   11691            0 :             if (assertionStats.infoMessages.size() == 1)
   11692            0 :                 msg << " with message:";
   11693            0 :             if (assertionStats.infoMessages.size() > 1)

   11702              :                     "with expansion:\n"

   11705              :

   11841            0 :     void XmlReporter::assertionEnded( AssertionStats const& assertionStats ) {
   11842              : 
   11843            0 :         AssertionResult const& result = assertionStats.assertionResult;
   11844              : 
   11845            0 :         bool includeResults = m_config->includeSuccessfulResults() || !result.isOk();
   11846              : 
   11847            0 :         if( includeResults || result.getResultType() == ResultWas::Warning ) {
   11848              :             // Print any info messages in <Info> tags.
   11849            0 :             for( auto const& msg : assertionStats.infoMessages ) {
   11850            0 :                 if( msg.type == ResultWas::Info && includeResults ) {
   11851            0 :                     auto t = m_xml.scopedElement( "Info" );
   11852            0 :                     writeSourceInfo( msg.lineInfo );
   11853            0 :                     t.writeText( msg.message );
   11854            0 :                 } else if ( msg.type == ResultWas::Warning ) {
   11855            0 :                     auto t = m_xml.scopedElement( "Warning" );
   11856            0 :                     writeSourceInfo( msg.lineInfo );
   11857            0 :                     t.writeText( msg.message );
   11858            0 :                 }
   11859              :             }
   11860              :         }
   11861              : 
   11862              :         // Drop out if result was successful but we're not printing them.
   11863            0 :         if ( !includeResults && result.getResultType() != ResultWas::Warning &&
   11864            0 :              result.getResultType() != ResultWas::ExplicitSkip ) {
   11865            0 :             return;
   11866              :         }
   11867              : 
   11868              :         // Print the expression if there is one.
   11869            0 :         if( result.hasExpression() ) {
   11870            0 :             m_xml.startElement( "Expression" )
   11871            0 :                 .writeAttribute( "success"_sr, result.succeeded() )
   11872            0 :                 .writeAttribute( "type"_sr, result.getTestMacroName() );
   11873              : 
   11874            0 :             writeSourceInfo( result.getSourceInfo() );
   11875              : 
   11876            0 :             m_xml.scopedElement( "Original" )
   11877            0 :                 .writeText( result.getExpression() );
   11878            0 :             m_xml.scopedElement( "Expanded" )
   11879            0 :                 .writeText( result.getExpandedExpression() );
   11880              :         }
   11881              : 
   11882              :         // And... Print a result applicable to each result type.
   11883            0 :         switch( result.getResultType() ) {
   11884            0 :             case ResultWas::ThrewException:
   11885            0 :                 m_xml.startElement( "Exception" );
   11886            0 :                 writeSourceInfo( result.getSourceInfo() );
   11887            0 :                 m_xml.writeText( result.getMessage() );
   11888            0 :                 m_xml.endElement();
   11889            0 :                 break;
   11890            0 :             case ResultWas::FatalErrorCondition:
   11891            0 :                 m_xml.startElement( "FatalErrorCondition" );
   11892            0 :                 writeSourceInfo( result.getSourceInfo() );
   11893            0 :                 m_xml.writeText( result.getMessage() );
   11894            0 :                 m_xml.endElement();
   11895            0 :                 break;
   11896            0 :             case ResultWas::Info:
   11897            0 :                 m_xml.scopedElement( "Info" )
   11898            0 :                      .writeText( result.getMessage() );
   11899            0 :                 break;
   11900            0 :             case ResultWas::Warning:
   11901              :                 // Warning will already have been written
   11902            0 :                 break;
   11903            0 :             case ResultWas::ExplicitFailure:
   11904            0 :                 m_xml.startElement( "Failure" );
   11905            0 :                 writeSourceInfo( result.getSourceInfo() );
   11906            0 :                 m_xml.writeText( result.getMessage() );
   11907            0 :                 m_xml.endElement();
   11908            0 :                 break;
   11909            0 :             case ResultWas::ExplicitSkip:
   11910            0 :                 m_xml.startElement( "Skip" );
   11911            0 :                 writeSourceInfo( result.getSourceInfo() );
   11912            0 :                 m_xml.writeText( result.getMessage() );
   11913            0 :                 m_xml.endElement();

   11916            0 :                 break;
   11917              :         }
   11918              : 
   11919            0 :         if( result.hasExpression() )
   11920            0 :             m_xml.endElement();
   11921              :     }
